channel.title: Looking for Development Team for God Pureage Scape 508/525
channel.description:
Hello welcome to 'God Pureage Scape' Deception.
What's our job?
Objects Commands Pkpoint system quest tab spawns items all godsword spec work fix bugs and glitches
What Are we Currently after?
we have:
1/3 Server Coders 'Im 1 one of them' God Pure 0/2 Website Designers Client Developer 0/2 Client Developer
We migth need more staff so apply even though if it is full.
'Use This format' [code]What position are you after ? : Experience? Are you active, and trustworthy?: We want full time, positions Do you fit this requirment and agree to the rules, of joining the 'God Pureage Scape' DEV team. 'See below for rules' 'yes or no' answer. : Msn: [/code]
Rules of joining the Deception Dev team.
1# if you pick coder, you must give me some information, on what your doing, and must actually code something.
#Client Developer, must keep me informed on the updates.
#Website designer, Reliable for keeping the forums maintaned and looking great.
Note: We do not Accept any immature people, you must be the real deal.
My Msn: god_pure@live.co.uk
Deception. :I'm Awsome:

item.title: Looking for Development Team for God Pureage Scape 508/525
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

Hello welcome to ‘God Pureage Scape’ Deception.

What’s our job?

Objects
Commands
Pkpoint system
quest tab spawns items
all godsword spec work
fix bugs and glitches

What Are we Currently after?

we have:

1/3 Server Coders ‘Im 1 one of them’ God Pure
0/2 Website Designers
Client Developer 0/2 Client Developer

We migth need more staff so apply even though if it is full.

‘Use This format’

What position are you after ? : Experience? Are you active, and trustworthy?: We want full time, positions Do you fit this requirment and agree to the rules, of joining the 'God Pureage Scape' DEV team. 'See below for rules' 'yes or no' answer. : Msn:

Rules of joining the Deception Dev team.

1# if you pick coder, you must give me some information, on what your doing, and must actually code something.

#Client Developer, must keep me informed on the updates.

#Website designer, Reliable for keeping the forums maintaned and looking great.

Note: We do not Accept any immature people, you must be the real deal.

My Msn: god_pure@live.co.uk

Deception. :I’m Awsome:
